name: The Institute for Intercultural Communication and Interdisciplinary Studies SILK ROAD
goal: The Institute for Intercultural Communication and Interdisciplinary Studies SILK ROAD is a Polish think tank, which was registered in March 2013. Our Institute is an independent, non – political and non-profit organization.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: international programs for the development of cross-cultural, scientific, educational and economic cooperation among citizens, organizations, institutions and companies both Polish and the counterparts abroad.
